name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior Firmware Engineer with 10+ years of experience in embedded systems and firmware development. Proficient in **C**, **C++**, **Linux**, and real-time operating systems (RTOS), with a strong grasp of hardware protocols like **AXI**, **AHB**, and **MMU**. Expertise in security measures including **cryptographic signatures**, **secure boot**, and **anti-rollback** mechanisms to ensure robust hardware security, complemented by hands-on experience with **hardware root-of-trust** systems. Skilled at debugging with tools such as **JTAG**, **UART**, and **ICE**, and adept in interfacing with **NVMe** and **ATA** storage solutions. Experienced with data integrity techniques involving **ECC**, **wear-leveling**, and **Flash Translation Layer** for reliable storage management. Demonstrated capability in anomaly detection through effective data monitoring. Additionally, brings strong scripting skills in **Python**, with a background in continuous integration and version control using **Git**. Passionate about delivering secure and high-quality firmware solutions that drive innovation in technology.
